## **Effect of  the COVID-19 Pandemic on Student Performances** 

Project Objectives:

-   Understand the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on student performance and academic outcomes.

-   Identify factors contributing to variations in student success during remote learning.

-   Provide recommendations and insights to inform future planning and
    decision-making related to student support, curriculum adjustments, and resource allocation.
